about_the_game:
Art Book for A.V.

This art book gives some detail behind the process involved when making art for A.V. as well as concept images and other interesting art pieces from the game.
detailed_description:
Art Book for A.V.

This art book gives some detail behind the process involved when making art for A.V. as well as concept images and other interesting art pieces from the game.
legal_notice: A.V. is copyrighted by Preston Johns & Douglas Lynn 2014.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 18 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Additional Notes: Artbook is provided in .png images.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Any
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 18 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Artbook is provided in .png images.

name: A.V. - Digital Art Book
